1: A song of ascents. Of David. How good and how pleasant it is, when brothers[b] dwell together as one!
2: Like fine oil on the head,[c] running down upon the beard, Upon the beard of Aaron, upon the collar of his robe.
3: Like dew[d] of Hermon coming down upon the mountains of Zion. There the Lord has decreed a blessing, life for evermore!
